title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2205.2 - Applicant responsibilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2205.2 - Applicant responsibilities

State Regulations

Each applicant for an award under this Subchapter shall be
responsible for submitting to the corporation a complete and timely
application, in such form as shall be prescribed by the board, and for the
accuracy of all information reported on such application. Further, the
applicant shall be responsible for providing timely notification to the
corporation of any change in his status, including, but not limited to, change
of address or change of institution of attendance, or in the information
provided the corporation which may affect any award made pursuant to this

Subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2205.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
